TrEd Extension: pdt_vallex (version 1.38)

PDT-ValLex Editor

(generated documentation)

Description:

Provides GUI interface for TrEd to the Czech valency lexicon PDT-ValLex with browse, search, edit and annotate capabilities.

Installation

This extension can be installed directly from TrEd, using Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Get New Extensions; just make sure the repository http://ufal.mff.cuni.cz/~pajas/tred/extensions/ is enabled in Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Edit Repositories.

TrEd macro files:

  • vallex/contrib.mac
  • vallex/non_gui.mak
  • vallex/pml_vallex.mak
  • vallex/standalone.pl
  • vallex/TrEd
  • vallex/ValLex

Stylesheet files:

  • /export/home/pajas/projects/tred-extensions/pdt_vallex/stylesheets/PML_Vallex

Resource files:

  • pmlbackend_conf.inc
  • vallex.dtd
  • vallex.rng
  • vallex_schema.xml
  • vallex.xml
  • vallex2pml.xsl
